item.title: Fox, Skip Bayless Settle Sexual Misconduct Lawsuit From Hairstylist
item.description: Bayless, FS1 executive producer of content Charlie Dixon and former ‘Speak’ host Joy Taylor are no longer with the network.

item.title: Fox and YouTube TV Reach New Carriage Deal, Averting Blackout
item.description: Fox, Fox News, FS1 and other channels will remain available on the streaming platform as the tech giant and media company reach a new deal.

item.title: Fox Sets Barstool Sports Morning Show at FS1
item.description: ‘Wake Up Barstool’ will run at 8 a.m. weekdays and feature Dave Portnoy, Dan “Big Cat” Katz, PFT Commenter and other talent from the media brand.

item.title: Fox Sees New Ad Dollars for Sports, News, Streaming in Latest Upfront Close
item.description: Fears that Trump tariffs would dampen TV’s annual “upfront” advertising market appear to have been overblown — at least for those media companies with a strong sports portfolio
